code: import React from"react";import{connect}from"react-redux";import CheckoutProduct from"../checkoutProduct/checkoutProduct.component";import CheckoutPromo from"../checkoutPromo/checkoutPromo.component";import CheckoutTotal from"../checkoutTotal/checkoutTotal.component";import"./checkoutDetails.styles.css";var localKey=[];var localdb=[];var CheckoutDetail=function CheckoutDetail(_ref){var count=_ref.count;var total=0;if(!localKey.includes(count.key)){localKey.push(count.key);localdb.push(count);}else if(count.count===0){localdb=localdb.map(function(db){if(db.key===count.key){db.name=0;db.count=0;return db;}else{return db;}});}else{localdb=localdb.map(function(db){if(db.key===count.key){return count;}else{return db;}});}localdb.map(function(content){if(content!==0&&content.count!==0){var str=content.price.substring(1);total=total+content.count*parseFloat(str);str="";}else if(content!==0&&content.count===undefined){console.log("hii");var _str=content.price.substring(1);total=total-parseFloat(_str);}});console.log(total);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"checkout-details"},localdb.map(function(content){return content===0?/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CheckoutProduct,{name:undefined,count:undefined}):/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CheckoutProduct,{key:content.key,name:content.name,count:content.count});}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CheckoutPromo,{total:total.toFixed(2)}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CheckoutTotal,{total:total.toFixed(2)}));};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{count:state.product.count};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutDetail);
